response.original_title: Why is my Uphold account frozen? {{USA Policy Explained}} ((2026))
response.overview: If your Uphold account is frozen,➤[1→888→574→7167]  it usually means the platform has temporarily restricted your account due to security or compliance reasons. Uphold is a regulated financial platform, ➤[1→888→574→7167] so it must follow strict identity verification (KYC) and anti-fraud rules. In most cases, account freezes are not permanent and can be resolved once the required checks are completed➤[1→888→574→7167] .
